name: Bouncy Friend's
description:
Touch left and right  the screen to move the ball and collect all the stars.
Get more trophies with minimal movement.
Collect more characters by earning trophies and coins

[Game Features]
- A familiar but new bounce ball game.
- You can receive various and cute characters by collecting trophies and coins during       the game.
- With the characters you have earned, you can apply various theme in game.
- With the simple touch or click, you can experience  thrilling game play
- Provide achievements and leaderboards.
- Numerous languages are supported.
- Multiplayer will be updated later.

[Precautions]
1. In this game, data is initialized when the mobile phone is replaced or when the app is deleted.
